title: Obtain the Sinner
text: Good to see you're well, Chief. Is bumping into you here a matter of destiny, coincidence... or a manipulated incident?

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: How do you want me to repay you for helping me like this?

title: Raise to Phase 3
text: The bell tolls, playing the rites of the people, praising the voices of humanity... The so-called "sacred sign" has always existed between you and me.

title: Level Start
text: Just at the right time.

title: Win Battles
text: Thanks~

title: Lose Battles
text: It seems that I, a mere scholar, can't stand up against the heavenly calamity anyways...

title: Ultimate Skill
text: The smoke has risen. Now, play your heart out.

title: Die in Battles
text: Is this written in my fate... huh, how I hate it...

title: Greeting
text: Got some good news, Chief. Want to hear it? I drew a fortune for you. You'll meet a very kind benefactor today... What are you looking for? Isn't it obvious that I'm right in front of you?

title: Conversation 1
text: Gods can't help you with your workload or relieve your stress, but maybe I can. Why don't you give it a try by asking nicely?

title: Conversation 2
text: Some people long for those bizarre and magical stories, and some fear those miracles beyond human power... So, which one are you, Chief?

title: Conversation 3
text: A good fragrance, a collection of thoughts, a heart that seeks the truthâ€”that's all a mythologist needs.

title: Special Conversation 1
text: If there really are gods and ghosts in the world, why hasn't anyone ever answer those pious wishes? But if they never existed... then where do people's prayers go...

title: Special Conversation 2
text: Did you see it? The sun rises and sets... the ordinary daily life that is yearned for by some is right here...

title: Special Conversation 3
text: I've told you so many legends now, it's only fair that I also hear some from you. But I don't like to share. I want stories you've never told anyone before, some secrets only known to the heavens, earth, you, and me.

title: Full Compliance
text: You've given me truth, trust, strength, and a place to belong. I've really taken advantage of you. From now on, let me take my time to pay you back.

title: Idle
text: Did you know, the Sun Crow can actually swim... Shh! This is a highly confidential heavenly secret. Don't let anyone hear it.

title: Annoyed
text: Stop messing around... My incense burner might just come alive and swallow you whole!

title: Special Attention
text: Legend has it that if you bow three times and kowtow nine times towards the direction of the sunset, a wish can be granted... Oh, you didn't fall for it?

title: Dispatch
text: Such a bustling and glamorous foreign land. Aren't you afraid I might be tempted away by this dazzling world?

title: Dispatch Complete
text: I'm back empty handed... Just kidding, here you go~

title: Level Up
text: So this is the craftsmanship of the great DisCity?

title: Join Team
text: Hmm... I must take this seriously now.

title: Head Pat
text: In my hometown, casually touching other people's heads could lead to... Nevermind, it's better if you don't know.
